body_html: The lack of hardware acceleration on Android is a huge problem. The Pixel 2 even has a special processor called the Pixel Visual Core, but as far as I can tell it's not used by the Android NN API. And this is Google's flagship Android Phone! Meanwhile the iPhone has great hardware acceleration with Metal...
